member.name: T:Neuroglia.AsyncApi.Sdk.Models.AsyncApiDocument
member.summary: Represents an Async API document

member.name: P:Neuroglia.AsyncApi.Sdk.Models.AsyncApiDocument.AsyncApi
member.summary: Gets/sets the the AsyncAPI Specification version being used. It can be used by tooling Specifications and clients to interpret the version.
member.remarks: The structure shall be major.minor.patch, where patch versions must be compatible with the existing major.minor tooling. Typically patch versions will be introduced to address errors in the documentation, and tooling should typically be compatible with the corresponding major.minor (1.0.*). Patch versions will correspond to patches of this document.

member.name: P:Neuroglia.AsyncApi.Sdk.Models.AsyncApiDocument.Id
member.summary: Gets/sets the identifier of the application the AsyncAPI document is defining.

member.name: P:Neuroglia.AsyncApi.Sdk.Models.AsyncApiDocument.Info
member.summary: Gets/sets the object that provides metadata about the API. The metadata can be used by the clients if needed.

member.name: P:Neuroglia.AsyncApi.Sdk.Models.AsyncApiDocument.Servers
member.summary: Gets/sets a containing name/configuration mappings for the application's servers

member.name: P:Neuroglia.AsyncApi.Sdk.Models.AsyncApiDocument.DefaultContentType
member.summary: Gets/sets the default content type to use when encoding/decoding a message's payload.

member.name: P:Neuroglia.AsyncApi.Sdk.Models.AsyncApiDocument.Channels
member.summary: Gets/sets a collection containing the available channels and messages for the API.

member.summary: Gets/sets the 's type

member.summary: Gets/sets the topic where the Last Will and Testament message will be sent.

member.summary: Gets/sets an integer that defines how hard the broker/client will try to ensure that the Last Will and Testament message is received. Its value MUST be either 0, 1 or 2.

member.summary: Gets/sets a boolean indicating whether the broker should retain the Last Will and Testament message or not.

member.summary: Gets/sets an integer that defines the Quality of Service (QoS) levels for the message flow between client and server. Its value MUST be either 0 (At most once delivery), 1 (At least once delivery), or 2 (Exactly once delivery).

member.name: P:Neuroglia.AsyncApi.Sdk.Models.Bindings.Mqtt.MqttOperationBinding.Retain
member.summary: Gets/sets a boolean indicating whether the broker the broker should retain the message or not.

member.summary: Gets/sets a boolean indicating whether to create a persisten connection or not. When false, the connection will is persistent.

member.summary: Gets/sets an an external definition of this channel item. The referenced structure MUST be in the format of a Channel Item Object. If there are conflicts between the referenced definition and this Channel Item's definition, the behavior is undefined.

member.summary: Gets/sets the definition of the message payload. It can be of any type but defaults to Schema object. It must match the , including encoding type - e.g Avro should be inlined as either a YAML or JSON object NOT a string to be parsed as YAML or JSON.

member.name: P:Neuroglia.AsyncApi.Sdk.Models.MessageDefinition.Traits
member.summary: Gets/sets a of traits to apply to the message object. Traits MUST be merged into the message object using the JSON Merge Patch algorithm in the same order they are defined here.

member.name: T:Neuroglia.AsyncApi.Sdk.Models.MessageTraitDefinition
member.summary: Represents an object used to define a Async API operation message trait

member.name: P:Neuroglia.AsyncApi.Sdk.Models.MessageTraitDefinition.Headers
member.summary: Gets/sets a of the application headers. Schema MUST be of type "object". It MUST NOT define the protocol headers.

member.name: P:Neuroglia.AsyncApi.Sdk.Models.MessageTraitDefinition.CorrelationId
member.summary: Gets/sets the definition of the correlation ID used for message tracing or matching.

member.name: P:Neuroglia.AsyncApi.Sdk.Models.MessageTraitDefinition.SchemaFormat
member.summary: Gets/sets a string containing the name of the schema format used to define the message payload. If omitted, implementations should parse the payload as a . When the payload is defined using a $ref to a remote file, it is RECOMMENDED the schema format includes the file encoding type to allow implementations to parse the file correctly. E.g., adding +yaml if content type is application/vnd.apache.avro results in application/vnd.apache.avro+yaml.

member.name: P:Neuroglia.AsyncApi.Sdk.Models.MessageTraitDefinition.ContentType
member.summary: Gets/sets the content type to use when encoding/decoding a message's payload. The value MUST be a specific media type (e.g. application/json). When omitted, the value MUST be the one specified on the property.

member.name: P:Neuroglia.AsyncApi.Sdk.Models.MessageTraitDefinition.Name
member.summary: Gets/sets a machine-friendly name for the message.

member.name: P:Neuroglia.AsyncApi.Sdk.Models.MessageTraitDefinition.Title
member.summary: Gets/sets a human-friendly title for the message.

member.name: P:Neuroglia.AsyncApi.Sdk.Models.MessageTraitDefinition.Summary
member.summary: Gets/sets a short summary of what the message is about.

member.name: P:Neuroglia.AsyncApi.Sdk.Models.MessageTraitDefinition.Description
member.summary: Gets/sets an optional description of the message. CommonMark syntax can be used for rich text representation.

member.name: P:Neuroglia.AsyncApi.Sdk.Models.MessageTraitDefinition.Tags
member.summary: gets/sets a of tags for API documentation control. Tags can be used for logical grouping of operations.

member.name: P:Neuroglia.AsyncApi.Sdk.Models.MessageTraitDefinition.ExternalDocs
member.summary: Gets/sets a containing additional external documentation for this message.

member.name: P:Neuroglia.AsyncApi.Sdk.Models.MessageTraitDefinition.Bindings
member.summary: Gets/sets an object used to configure the 's s

member.name: P:Neuroglia.AsyncApi.Sdk.Models.MessageTraitDefinition.Examples
member.summary: Gets/sets an where keys MUST be either headers and/or payload. Values MUST contain examples that validate against the headers or payload fields, respectively. Example MAY also have the name and summary additional keys to provide respectively a machine-friendly name and a short summary of what the example is about.

member.name: P:Neuroglia.AsyncApi.Sdk.Models.OperationTraitDefinition.OperationId
member.summary: Gets/sets a unique string used to identify the operation. The id MUST be unique among all operations described in the API. The operationId value is case-sensitive. Tools and libraries MAY use the operationId to uniquely identify an operation, therefore, it is RECOMMENDED to follow common programming naming conventions.

member.name: T:Neuroglia.AsyncApi.Sdk.Models.ServerDefinition
member.summary: Represents an object used to describe a message broker, a server or any other kind of computer program capable of sending and/or receiving data.
member.remarks: This object is used to capture details such as URIs, protocols and security configuration. Variable substitution can be used so that some details, for example usernames and passwords, can be injected by code generation tools.

member.name: P:Neuroglia.AsyncApi.Sdk.Models.ServerDefinition.Url
member.summary: Gets/sets the pointing to the contact information.

member.name: P:Neuroglia.AsyncApi.Sdk.Models.ServerDefinition.Protocol
member.summary: Gets/sets the protocol this URL supports for connection. Supported protocol include, but are not limited to: amqp, amqps, http, https, ibmmq, jms, kafka, kafka-secure, mqtt, secure-mqtt, stomp, stomps, ws, wss, mercure.

member.name: P:Neuroglia.AsyncApi.Sdk.Models.ServerDefinition.ProtocolVersion
member.summary: Gets/sets the version of the protocol used for connection. For instance: AMQP 0.9.1, HTTP 2.0, Kafka 1.0.0, etc.

member.name: P:Neuroglia.AsyncApi.Sdk.Models.ServerDefinition.Description
member.summary: Gets/sets an optional string describing the host designated by the URL. CommonMark syntax MAY be used for rich text representation.

member.name: P:Neuroglia.AsyncApi.Sdk.Models.ServerDefinition.Variables
member.summary: Gets/sets an optional string describing the host designated by the URL. CommonMark syntax MAY be used for rich text representation.

member.name: P:Neuroglia.AsyncApi.Sdk.Models.ServerDefinition.Security
member.summary: Gets/sets an of values that represent alternative security requirement objects that can be used. Only one of the security requirement objects need to be satisfied to authorize a connection or operation.

member.name: P:Neuroglia.AsyncApi.Sdk.Models.ServerDefinition.Bindings
member.summary: Gets/sets an object used to configure the 's s

member.summary: Gets/sets the name of the tag.

member.name: P:Neuroglia.AsyncApi.Sdk.Models.TagDefinition.Description
member.summary: Gets/sets an optional description of this channel item. CommonMark syntax can be used for rich text representation.

member.name: P:Neuroglia.AsyncApi.Sdk.Models.TagDefinition.ExternalDocs
member.summary: Gets/sets a containing additional external documentation for this tag.

member.name: T:Neuroglia.AsyncApi.Sdk.Models.VariableDefinition
member.summary: Represents an object used to describe a Server Variable for server URL template substitution.

member.name: P:Neuroglia.AsyncApi.Sdk.Models.VariableDefinition.Enum
member.summary: Gets/sets an of values to be used if the substitution options are from a limited set.

member.name: P:Neuroglia.AsyncApi.Sdk.Models.VariableDefinition.Default
member.summary: Gets/sets the default value to use for substitution, and to send, if an alternate value is not supplied.

member.name: P:Neuroglia.AsyncApi.Sdk.Models.VariableDefinition.Description
member.summary: Gets/sets an optional string describing the server variable. CommonMark syntax MAY be used for rich text representation.

member.name: P:Neuroglia.AsyncApi.Sdk.Models.VariableDefinition.Examples
member.summary: Gets/sets an of examples of the server variable.

member.name: T:Neuroglia.AsyncApi.Sdk.MqttQoSLevel
member.summary: Enumerates all supported MQTT Quality of Service types

member.name: F:Neuroglia.AsyncApi.Sdk.MqttQoSLevel.AtMostOne
member.summary: Indicates that messages should be sent at most once

member.name: F:Neuroglia.AsyncApi.Sdk.MqttQoSLevel.AtLeastOne
member.summary: Indicates that messages should be sent at least once

member.name: F:Neuroglia.AsyncApi.Sdk.MqttQoSLevel.ExactlyOne
member.summary: Indicates that MQTT messages should be sent exactly once
